{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$7.1M in 2021-2022** on contracts with TRANSWEST AIR.

Across 33 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 5 have at least one amendment (15%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 127% and the average number of amendments was 1.2. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$3.3M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.54 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$1.4M. The longest contract was 4 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$18.1M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

- [Transwest Air LLP](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Transwest%20Air%20LLP%22)
{{< /details >}}
